Name: Soney
description:
Soney is 27 years old and married. From Tbaung Khmum province, she has a dependent son under the age of school. To support a living, she and her husband have been growing cassava and rice for years. Pests and diseases are challenges to her farming business.

Soney is a fifth cycle borrower with VisionFund. Past loans have enabled her to renovate her old house and to buy household supplies.

She is going to use her loan to buy organic fertilizer and organic pesticide, and to pay for labor's fees.

She hopes that she can generate more income to expand her cassava farmland and to send her son to school.
